LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Cedarmaker.label: cedarmaker
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Cedarmaker.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in cedar wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a cedar-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Ebonymaker.label: ebonymaker
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Ebonymaker.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in ebony wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a ebony-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Mahoganymaker.label: mahoganymaker
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Mahoganymaker.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in mahogany wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a mahogany-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Rosewoodmaker.label: rosewoodmaker
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_Rosewoodmaker.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in rosewood wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a rosewood-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.
